idea: Currently, there is no resources/ information available for anyone who wants to pursue alternative careers (E.g. Makeup, Fitness, editing etc.). Furthermore, all training institutes are very small and localised. We are building a platform that will give all information about these careers, ensure students get trained to become professionals in their chosen fields and have the ability to convert their passion into their profession.
name: RADAL INFOTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
This concept was developed in response to a 'Market Gap' between 'Retailers and Online', as well as Large Retail Chains.

It’s a digital time! In this era, we have a new world called the 'Digital World,' where India being the fastest growing economy with 90% smart phone adoption and the third fastest growing economy in the world, where customers are much more aware and selective in a competitive environment where MNCs, NEW Startups, and Local Players are working on all possible aspects and developing numerous innovative products and overcoming multiple challenges to remain viable in the market.

With an increasing urban population and increasingly hectic lifestyles, and customers preferring a more convenient way of shopping that’s online, easy product selection of favorite brands delivered to their doorsteps, and a return and others attractive policy, the online market place is booming.
name: Apex Fresh India
